column5: Great place for fishing, not such a great place for minors....  http://news.nationalpost.com/news/canada/ontario-teacher-accused-of-36-sex-crimes-making-pornography-involving-youths-aged-12-to-15
isnt that where David Russell Williams lived too what the hell is in the water there
Was she teaching sex ed.   Lights camera roll it.  Now put it on line.  Crazy.
Back in my day she'd have been the most popular teacher in school (well at least with us guys)

This kind of crime used to get swept under the carpet when I was growing up. Kids would be blamed and the teacher quietly transferred. I'm just glad to hear that the police are catching up to some of these bad apples. We had a deviant teacher in our high school back in the 70's. Teacher had molested some of the girls in the hockey team for a few years. Got away with it until he molested a cops daughter. The police came down on the school like a ton of bricks in a rare show of force back then. They went straight up to his classroom, put him in cuffs, and paraded him out the school during lunch for all the students to see.
Back in my day she'd have been the most popular teacher in school (well at least with us guys)    Now we know why they call you BIG Cliff,
